title: Any idea how big the new season update is ?
body:
So i'm currently on a really tight data plan, and have no time to go to public wi-fi or some sorts. Anyone know the numbers ? MB/GB ?
Thanks by the way.

replies.body:
I didn't actually see how big the patch was when my client updated, but it actually looked like it was only around 250 or so mbs. I'm really not sure so don't quote me on that xD!

If you're worried about it eating up your data, I'd think you should be fine but it might be worth hitting up some public wifi for the download just in case.
